plies: wanna ask the government why yall hate us so much  wanna ask the other color why yall hate us so much wanna ask the law why yall hate us so much wanna ask the prosecutor why yall hate us so go to court yo peoples was born with money my peoples was born broke yo peoples lived in mansions my peoples hung from ropes yo peoples had it made all my peoples had was hope yo peoples had help all make it we had to rap sang or try sports we couldnt afford a full ride shit my people poor my people aint mad yo people hates us though but we the one who struggling so why yall hate us for the police want us bad the judge hate us more the jury think we guilty before we come through the door and yall take our money but yall wont help us though and yall biggest fear is to see my people grow but our
